page.title: 03SCHOOL PRODUCTIONS
page.content: SCHOOL PRODUCTIONS ARE VERY EXCITING. IT IS NICE TO GO TO ALL THE REHEARSALS.ALTHOUGH IT'S HARD WORK LEARNING ALL THE WORDS,ACTIONS AND DANCES IT IS ALL WORTH WHILE. I STARRED IN "JOSEPH AND THE AMAZING TECHNICOOUR DREAMCOAT".I WAS DANCING. IT WAS BRILLIANT FUN DOING ALL THE DANCES. I DANCED IN THEM ALL.THE FIRST NIGHT IS THE BEST NIGHT BECAUSE YOU'RE READY TO GO AND EXCITED.AFTER ABOUT SEVEN REHEARSALS YOU'RE ACTUALLY DOING IT. YOU FEEL VERY NERVOUS BUT ABOUT TWO MINUTES INTO THE FIRST DANCE YOU JUST WANT TO ENOY YOURSELF.IT WENT ON FOR ABOUT AN HOUR AND A HALF,WE DID THREE PERFORMANCES,ONE FOR CHILDREN OF THE SCHOOL AND THE OTHERS FOR PARENTS. MR RYDER WAS CONDUCTING THE MUSIC, THERE WAS A CHOIR.THERE WAS AN INTERVAL HALF WAY THROUGH THEN WE WENT ON. I ENJOYED STARRING IN IT VERY MUCH
